title: Flip - Random Number Generator
summary: Roll dice and flip coins with a touch of a button on Android and Android Wear
description: Flip is a Material Design styled random number generator, designed to be fast, smooth, and feature-packed.Features:• Dice Roll: Roll a 6-sided die.• Coin Flip: Flip a 2-sided coin.• Pick from List: Pick a random item from a list.• Custom Dice Roll: Roll a die with a custom amount of sides, for example, a 20-sided die.• Support for Wear devices: Roll a die or flip a coin on your Android™ Wear smartwatch• Quick Settings tiles on Android 7.0 and up, so you can roll a die or flip a coin from any app, any time.Source: https://github.com/piggehperson/flip
descriptionHTML:
Flip is a Material Design styled random number generator, designed to be fast, smooth, and feature-packed.
Features:
• Dice Roll: Roll a 6-sided die.
• Coin Flip: Flip a 2-sided coin.
• Pick from List: Pick a random item from a list.
• Custom Dice Roll: Roll a die with a custom amount of sides, for example, a 20-sided die.
• Support for Wear devices: Roll a die or flip a coin on your Android™ Wear smartwatch
• Quick Settings tiles on Android 7.0 and up, so you can roll a die or flip a coin from any app, any time.

Source: https://github.com/piggehperson/flip
comments: Anyone who votes less than 5, is ridiculous! It's exactly what you need for a simple coin toss or dice roll. Quick, clear and ad-free.
Hey guys, exception founded. :v When I try to pick from an empty list I think I'm trying parse the void string "" or whatever. Great app!
Awesome tool for tabletop RPGs. The only thing I could think to add would be the ability to roll multiple dice at the same time instead of rolling say 3 individual dice.
Amazing App This app really helps when you don't have dice or coins but need to settle something.
Polished Compared to other apps like this, this one is quite polished.
Beautiful and useful Beautiful animations. Amazing instance of material design in a functional and useful app
